Author: marlow925
Content:
PicoMic 3, DJI Mic Mini, InstaMic Pro Plus C, DJI Mic 2
 The one, that is the most inconspicous of them all is the PicoMic, because it's microphone is in the clip. The body goes behind your shirt collar.
 It also has the longest battery run time in one go: 20 hours.
 And it can take a lav.
 What it doesn't have: it's not a bluetooth mic and it's receiver doesn't have a USB audio interface.
 The InstaMic is the only of the 4 that can do timecode ... and is waterproof. Timecode it needs, as it can't be directly connected to most cameras. It's either a 32-bit float recorder or a bluetooth mic.
 I forgot the Wireless Pro set in the office .. but most of us know how much bigger that is.
